definitions: the property or quality of being white in color

examples.text: a landscape dominated by the whiteness of snow

shortDefinitions: property or quality of being white

definitions: the quality of being very pale

examples.text: the whiteness of her skin, like fine porcelain

definitions: the fact or state of belonging to a human group having light-colored skin

examples.text: whiteness was defined as both a racial and a regional characteristic

shortDefinitions: fact or state of belonging to human group having light-coloured skin
